channel.description: Recent content in shell on SCL Blog

item.title: Installing nano text editor on Android
item.author: team@silocitylabs.com (Silo City Labs LLC)
item.description:
After a while of playing around with my build.prop file in Android I needed a way to edit faster using a text editor via adb shell.

I found a way using a couple of online sources to get it going. You will need to be on a rooted device.

item.title: Kafka Cheat Sheet
item.author: team@silocitylabs.com (Silo City Labs LLC)
item.description: Throughout my time working with kafka I have developed great software to use with it. But while the software did many things there are other things I still resorted to this cheat sheet for. I have put together this list of commands which I will keep updated here as I find new links and commands that help. My kafka installtion was under /opt/kafka and you will need to change this to your path you installed kafka too. You can also create a symlink and just copy paste commands as they are after changing ip’s.
